scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:admin
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && firebase hosting:channel:deploy staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:admin: npm run build:admin && firebase deploy --only hosting:admin
scripts.deploy:main: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:main
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:all && firebase deploy --only hosting
